TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit PageAsyncTask extends System.Object

summary.span: 包含有关注册到页的异步任务的信息。

span.span: Contains information about an asynchronous task registered to a page.
This class cannot be inherited.

remarks.format: ## Remarks ASP.NET 版本2.0 允许你向页面注册多个任务, 并在呈现页面之前以异步方式运行这些任务。ASP.NET version 2.0 allows you to register multiple tasks to a page and run them asynchronously prior to rendering the page. 你可以指定在任务速度缓慢且不希望其他进程在执行时进行关联的情况下, 以异步方式运行任务。You might specify that a task be run asynchronously if it is a slow process and you do not want other processes to be tied up while it is executing. 异步任务可以并行执行, 也可以按顺序执行。The asynchronous tasks can be executed in parallel or sequentially. 必须通过方法向页面注册对象。 A object must be registered to the page through the method. 不需要异步处理页本身即可执行异步任务。The page itself does not have to be processed asynchronously to execute asynchronous tasks. 您可以将`Async`属性设置`true`为 (如下面的代码示例所示), 或`false`在页指令上进行异步处理的异步任务。You can set the `Async` attribute to either `true` (as shown in the following code example) or `false` on the page directive and the asynchronous tasks will still be processed asynchronously: `<%@ Page Async="true" %>` 当特性设置为`false`时, 将阻止执行页的线程, 直到所有异步任务完成。 `Async`When the `Async` attribute is set to `false`, the thread that executes the page will be blocked until all asynchronous tasks are complete. 如果尚未执行事件, 则在该事件之前注册的任何异步任务都将自动执行。Any asynchronous tasks registered before the event will be executed automatically by the page if they have not already been executed. 必须通过方法显式执行在事件之后注册的异步任务。Those asynchronous tasks registered after the event must be executed explicitly through the method. 方法还可用于在事件之前启动任务。 The method can also be used to start tasks before the event. 方法在尚未执行的页上执行所有已注册的异步任务。The method executes all the registered asynchronous tasks on the page that have not been executed. 默认情况下, 如果异步任务在45秒内未完成, 则会超时。By default, an asynchronous task will time out if it has not completed within 45 seconds. 您可以在 web.config 文件或 page 指令中指定不同的超时值。You can specify a different time-out value in either the Web.config file or the page directive. Web.config ``文件的节`asyncTimeout`包含特性, 如下所示。The `` section of the Web.config file contains an `asyncTimeout` attribute, as shown below. `` `` `` `` Page 指令包含`AsyncTimeout`特性。The page directive contains an `AsyncTimeout` attribute. `<%@ Page AsyncTimeout="30" %>` ## Examples 下面的代码示例向页面注册三个异步任务并并行执行它们。The following code example registers three asynchronous tasks to a page and executes them in parallel. 每个任务都调用一个方法, 该方法仅导致线程进入5秒。Each task calls a method that merely causes the thread to sleep for 5 seconds. [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.UI.PageAsyncTask#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.PageAsyncTask/CS/page_asynctask.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.UI.PageAsyncTask#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.PageAsyncTask/VB/page_asynctask.aspx#1)] [!code-csharp[System.Web.UI.PageAsyncTask#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.PageAsyncTask/CS/App_Code/SlowTask.cs#2)] [!code-vb[System.Web.UI.PageAsyncTask#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.PageAsyncTask/VB/App_Code/SlowTask.vb#2)]

summary.span: 使用能取消任务的事件处理程序初始化 类的新实例。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class using an event handler that enables the task to be canceled.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此构造函数包装委托, 以便对象可以将异步代码 (基于对象) 与现有的 ASP.NET Web 窗体异步页功能集成。This constructor wraps a delegate so that the object can integrate asynchronous code (based on objects) with the existing ASP.NET Web Forms asynchronous pages feature. ASP.NET 将根据网页 `@ Page`指令中设置的属性, 向传递给委托的对象发出信号。ASP.NET will signal the object that is passed to a delegate for cancellation based on the attribute set in the `@ Page` directive of the Web page. 达到此值时 , 将终止对象。When the value has been reached, the object will be signaled. 参数必须传递到由类的实现调用的任何异步 api。 `CancellationToken`The `CancellationToken` parameter must be passed to any asynchronous APIs that are called by your implementation of the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此构造函数的实现将属性设置为`false` , 以便不会与页面上的其他任务并行处理异步任务。This implementation of the constructor sets the property to `false` so the asynchronous task is not processed in parallel with other tasks on the page.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此构造函数的实现允许您设置异步任务是否将与页面上的其他任务并行处理。This implementation of the constructor allows you to set whether the asynchronous task will be processed in parallel with other tasks on the page. ## Examples 下面的代码示例创建三个相互并行处理的异步任务。The following code example creates three asynchronous tasks that are processed in parallel to each other. 此示例摘自类概述中的一个更大的示例。This example is part of a larger example found in the class overview. summary.span: 获取一个值，该值指示任务能否与其他任务并行处理。

span.span: Gets a value that indicates whether the task can be processed in parallel with other tasks.

value.span: 如果任务应当与其他任务并行处理，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if the task should be processed in parallel with other tasks; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在构造函数中设置属性。The property is set in the constructor. 如果在页中注册了多个任务, 并将属性设置`true`为, 则会同时处理这些任务。When multiple tasks are registered in a page and the property is set to `true`, then those tasks are processed concurrently. 但是, 如果将属性设置为`false`, 则会按顺序处理这些任务。However, if the property is set to `false`, then those tasks are processed sequentially. 例如, 如果某个页面包含两个异步任务, 每个任务都需要5秒才能完成, `true`并且设置为, 则这两个任务将在5秒内完成。For example, if a page contained two asynchronous tasks that each took 5 seconds to complete and is set to `true`, both tasks will complete in 5 seconds. 如果将这两`false`个任务的设置为, 则第一个任务将在5秒内完成, 第二个任务将在第一个任务完成5秒后完成。If is set to `false` for these same two tasks, then the first task will complete in 5 seconds and the second task will complete 5 seconds after the completion of the first task. ## Examples 下面的代码示例定义了三个异步任务, 每个任务都是并行处理的。The following code example defines three asynchronous tasks that are each set to be processed in parallel. 此示例摘自类概述中的一个更大的示例。This example is part of a larger example found in the class overview. [!code-csharp[System.Web.UI.PageAsyncTask#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.PageAsyncTask/CS/page_asynctask.aspx#3)] [!code-vb[System.Web.UI.PageAsyncTask#3](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.PageAsyncTask/VB/page_asynctask.aspx#3)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此属性在构造函数中设置, 在执行异步任务期间不能修改。The property is set in the constructor and cannot be modified during execution of the asynchronous task. 可以通过将唯一字符串值分配给各自的属性, 来区分页面中的异步任务。You can differentiate asynchronous tasks in a page by assigning unique string values to their respective properties. ## Examples 下面的代码示例创建三个异步任务, 并为其属性提供唯一值。The following code example creates three asynchronous tasks and gives them unique values for their properties. 此示例摘自类概述中的一个更大的示例。This example is part of a larger example found in the class overview. [!code-csharp[System.Web.UI.PageAsyncTask#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.PageAsyncTask/CS/page_asynctask.aspx#3)] [!code-vb[System.Web.UI.PageAsyncTask#3](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.PageAsyncTask/VB/page_asynctask.aspx#3)]
